Description:
Hello Champions! We hope everyone is having a great summer or winter (depending on the hemisphere you reside in) so far. This is a reminder that the program takes a break in August, and community calls will resume on September 23, 2025. Our September call will dive into what community tools are included in a Microsoft 365 Copilot license, and how to use Microsoft Viva Engage for Copilot adoption.

In the meantime, the new calendar reminders for September 2025-July 2026 are available to download on the Champions-only resource page - you'll find the link in the welcome email when you joined the Champion program or in the last newsletter from July.

- Haven't joined the program yet? It's free! Join here: [https://aka.ms/M365Champion](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Faka.ms%2FM365Champion&data=05%7C01%7Cjhwang%40microsoft.com%7Cb9d47dd0f8754cf3332f08da77135012%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C637953222073818900%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=wO2Lu5LDamXaEYf2Q1kcQ0zR1U0qH4dEWOZ56U0UM7w%3D&reserved=0).
- Bring your questions to our discussion forum: [https://aka.ms/DriveAdoption](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Faka.ms%2FDriveAdoption&data=05%7C01%7Cjhwang%40microsoft.com%7Cb9d47dd0f8754cf3332f08da77135012%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C637953222073818900%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=AicZcTcPhECji8pjFyuTrT9ddz9qG9GFplBImafTFe4%3D&reserved=0) on the Microsoft Tech Community (MTC).

See you all in September!
Author: JessieHwang
EnhancedContent:
## Community calls will resume in September 2025

Hello Champions! We hope everyone is having a great summer or winter (depending on the hemisphere you reside in) so far. This is a reminder that the program takes a break in August, and community calls will resume on September 23, 2025. Our September call will dive into what community tools are included in a Microsoft 365 Copilot license, and how to use Microsoft Viva Engage for Copilot adoption.

In the meantime, the new calendar reminders for September 2025-July 2026 are available to download on the Champions-only resource page - you'll find the link in the welcome email when you joined the Champion program or in the last newsletter from July.

- Haven't joined the program yet? It's free! Join here:Â [https://aka.ms/M365Champion](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Faka.ms%2FM365Champion&data=05%7C01%7Cjhwang%40microsoft.com%7Cb9d47dd0f8754cf3332f08da77135012%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C637953222073818900%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=wO2Lu5LDamXaEYf2Q1kcQ0zR1U0qH4dEWOZ56U0UM7w%3D&reserved=0).
- Bring your questions to our discussion forum: [https://aka.ms/DriveAdoption](https://nam06.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Faka.ms%2FDriveAdoption&data=05%7C01%7Cjhwang%40microsoft.com%7Cb9d47dd0f8754cf3332f08da77135012%7C72f988bf86f141af91ab2d7cd011db47%7C1%7C0%7C637953222073818900%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=AicZcTcPhECji8pjFyuTrT9ddz9qG9GFplBImafTFe4%3D&reserved=0) on the Microsoft Tech Community (MTC).

See you all in September!

Published Aug 12, 2025
